ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I think Najena is the easiest of the 3 Named NPC Spell Casters in Najena. She does not have 2000-2500 hp, I think 3 to 4 Inferno Shocks can kill her. (240
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I think Najena is the easiest of the 3 Named NPC Spell Casters in
Najena. She does not have 2000-2500 hp, I think 3 to 4 Inferno Shocks can
kill her. (240 damage each) Usually 2 or 3 magicians will come along with
her and their pets too. Just get a full party of level 27+ to avoid those
irritatting ogre guards without having to invs/camo and it will be safe to
camp Najena. Beware of Rathyl Incarnate though, he is rather strong and
almost wiped out my party of level 27s.
I dont think its Najena that HTs, more like Drelza (the necro with
Jboots) that HTs.
FBR is almost sure drop on Najena.

Mazy
Level 30 Wizard
Prexus

----- Original Message -----
From: Chen Lizhi <polarcoordinates@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 2:41 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO


> From: "Chen Lizhi" <polarcoordinates@...>
>
> If you want to fight Najena, you better get 2-3 nukers along. She got some
> kakis guarding here, Necro or Mage and each of them have a pet.So makes a
> grand total of abt. 5-7 MOBs in total. Plus, last I heard, she can cast
and
> melee also, plus she can HarmTouch ppl. Sometimes she can do up to 4-7 HT
in
> a round alone, but rare lar. Average is abt. 2-3. Want to kill her better
> get some REAL serious firepower to kill her hor, HP wise is around
> 2000-2500(estimate). Expect to lose a few ppl. in fighting her, her HT
kicks
> some serious butt.
> The Oracle in OOT is around 34-36. Don't think of soloing him, he got
> someone protecting him one, abt. 30-31 level guy. Small fries I don't
know,
> but I think a few level 20ish MOB around the oracle also.
> FBR is a rare drop on Najena(I think) So hunting J.Boots that time also
can
> hunt for FBR.
> Staff of Observer? A rare spawn EvilEye in the King's room in RunnyEye has
> it on him occasionally. He can charm, summon pet and get all his Goblins
> kakis to help him kill you. Level around low 30s. Not sure, but don't
think
> of soloing him.
> This one is rumor, there is another way of getting StaffofObserver. Go to
> Paw underwater room. Kill the HighShaman there and wait for the Drow Nixx
to
> spawn. If you see the Drow wearing a staff, if may be StaffofObserver.
Just
> rumor only hor, try if you have the time. DrowNixx is around 20-24 in
level
> and he got some bitching Rune 2 or 3 protecting him. I tried to kill it at
> 18 with 3 others. All end up Gating out :p
>
